item.title: Self-Driving Car Project
item.description: Today, we live in very competitive world with recent technologies that make peopleâ€™s lives easy and comfortable. People tend to be surrounded with these techs which allow them to be safe and well-being. Self-driving cars have recently taken my attention with their ubiquitous design, speed and automation that can be controlled without a person. I have recently experimented with a few self-driving car concepts that pertain to computer vision, including lane detection.
